sub comparison_value {
    my ($self, $val) = @_;
    return $self->display_value($val);
}
public method configobject::convert_newval_source (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in convert_newval_source: 12
sub convert_newval_source {
    my ($self, $newvalsource) = @_;
    my $inlinevarname = WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Config::inline_var($self->{var});
    my $newval;
    if($newvalsource =~ /widget/) {
        $newval = $self->{Module}->{r}->param($newvalsource);
    } else {
        $newval = $self->comparison_value(eval('$self->{Module}->{r}->ce->'.
            $inlinevarname));
    }
    return($newval);
}

sub display_value {
    my ($self, $val) = @_;
    return $val;
}
public method configobject::entry_widget (  )

# Number of lines of code in entry_widget: 9
sub entry_widget {
    my ($self, $name, $default) = @_;
    my $width = $self->{width} || 15;
    return CGI::textfield(
        -name => $name,
        -value => $default,
        -size => $width,
    );
}
public method configobject::new (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in new: 7
sub new {
    my $class = shift;
    my $self = shift;
    $self->{Module} = shift;
    bless $self, $class;
    return $self;
}
public method configobject::save_string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in save_string: 8
sub save_string {
    my ($self, $oldval, $newvalsource) = @_;
    my $varname = $self->{var};
    my $newval = $self->convert_newval_source($newvalsource);
    my $displayoldval = $self->display_value($oldval);
    return '' if($displayoldval eq $newval);
    return('$'. $varname . " = '$newval';\n");
}
public method configobject::what_string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in what_string: 18
sub what_string {
    my $self = shift;
    my $r = $self->{Module}->r;
    return(CGI::td(
        CGI::a({href=>$self->{Module}->systemLink(
            $r->urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_config',
                args=>{courseID => $r->urlpath->arg("courseID")}),
                params=>{show_long_doc=>1,
                    var_name=>"$self->{var}"}),
            target=>"_blank"},
            CGI::img({src=>$r->{ce}->{webworkURLs}->{htdocs}.
                "/images/question_mark.png",
                border=>"0", alt=>"$self->{var}", 
                style=>"float: right; padding-left: 0.1em;"})
        ) .
        $self->{doc} 
    ));
}
